member.name: T:Lab_5.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Lab_5.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Lab_5.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Lab_5.frmTextEditor
member.summary: Author Name: Praveen Paramanathan Project Name: Text Editor Date: 05-April-2019 Description Application to create and/or edit a text file.

member.name: M:Lab_5.frmTextEditor.NewToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: New - set the textbox back to their default state.

member.name: M:Lab_5.frmTextEditor.OpenToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Open - allows the user to browse folders and files to open a file they would like to change

member.name: M:Lab_5.frmTextEditor.SaveToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Save - allows the user to save the contents that were changed within the file

member.name: M:Lab_5.frmTextEditor.SaveAsToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: SaveAs - allows the user to browse folders save a file they had created

member.name: M:Lab_5.frmTextEditor.CopyToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Copy - allows the user to copy the selected text to their clipboard

member.name: M:Lab_5.frmTextEditor.CutToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Cut - allows the user to clear the selected text and save it to their clipboard

member.name: M:Lab_5.frmTextEditor.PasteToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Paste - allows the user to paste the last text they have in their clipboard

member.name: M:Lab_5.frmTextEditor.AboutToolStripMenuItem_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: About - gives information about the program
